Welcome to comb-model’s documentation!

comb-model is a Python library for simulation of trajectories of the comb model via Langevin equations driven by fractional Gaussian noises (long-range correlated).

Contents

  • comb-model: A package to simulate Fractional Brownian walks on a comb-like structure.
